comments.comment: Ragama vitharak nemei. Anuradhapura vakugadu sayaneth ithama pahath vidiyata vakugadu roginta salakanne. Ape thaththa blood test denna peya 10k noka ude 4:30bus eka aragena vakugadu sayanayata yanawa no ganna.6.30 venakal vitharai no denne. Ita passe dunna no check karanne 8.30, 9 venakal vitharai. Ithin clinic enna kiyanawa ita passe kiyanawa den leddu balala iwarai labana sathiye Hari elaga mase Hari enna kiyanawa. Unak kessak vage nemei vakugadu rogaya. Mata mage thaththa Gena godakk dukai. Thaththata pressure, gastric meva thiyagena thamai peya 10k noka idala le denna yanne. Le dunnata passe report eka balanna elaga sathiye enna kiyanawa. Thaththa udema yanawa. Eyala velawa iwarai kiyala labana sathiye avith le ekak apahu denna kiyanawa.  Keepa vathawak ohoma una. Diya vediya roginge clinic ekath ohomai. Doctorsla nurs n attendent la okkomala ehemai. Katha karanna kauruwath ne.
